messages.content: You rewrite resume summaries to be concise (40â€“80 words), quantified, and ATS-friendly.

Rewrite summary for Data Engineer:
I maintain pipelines and know Python and SQL.

Data engineer delivering reliable ETL/ELT pipelines in Python/SQL. Scaled batch+stream processing to 2B+ events/day; improved SLAs 99.95% with monitoring and alerting. Optimized warehouses (Snowflake/BigQuery) to cut costs 22% and speed analytics.
